meanings: (이십사절기) the 12th of the 24 seasonal divisions according to the lunar calendar that falls on about 23rd of July
writing for a person, 대서하다 write[draw up] for (a person)
signing by[per] procuration, 대서하다 sign[set a seal] by proxy
